concept.title: Installing the DITA Tookit small package distribution

prolog.author: Richard Johnson
Anna van Raaphorst
prolog.publisher: OASIS (Organization for the Advancement of Structured Information Standards)

keywords.indexterm: DITA Open Toolkit distributions small package distribution

conbody.p:
To install the small package distribution:
Download the small package from .
Unzip the package into the C:\ditaot directory on Windows, or into a home directory on Linux.
On Windows, add C:\ditaot\lib;C:\ditaot\lib\dost.jar;C:\ditaot\lib\resolver.jar to your CLASSPATH environment variable.
On Linux, set up your environment variable CLASSPATH. For example: export CLASSPATH=$CLASSPATH:${ditaot_dir}/lib:${ditaot_dir}/lib/dost.jar:${ditaot_dir}/lib/resolver.jar
